61.eng-name: The Names of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
61.ara-name: كتاب أسماء النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Malik related to me from Ibn Shihab from Muhammad ibn Jubayr ibn Mutim that the Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, "I have five names. I am Muhammad. I am Ahmad. I am al-Mahi (the effacer), by whom Allah effaces kufr. I am al-Hashir (the gatherer), before whom people are gathered. I am al-Aqib (the last)
